C

changeRules(String[]) - Method in class gui.YetAnotherChessGame
Captain Obvious here : It changes the rules *flies away*
Used when we load a file, we wrote it for custom games, you put 6 array of string (one for each chess piece) and it cut it to change the move capacities of the chess pieces.
changeTheme(Color[]) - Method in class gui.YetAnotherChessGame
We did not use it a lot cause of time and bad color tastes ...
checkGameIsEnded() - Method in class echecs.Echiquier
Check if the game is ended
checkNotCheckAfter(Deplacement) - Method in class echecs.Echiquier
Check if a move does not put the king in check

chessEvent(int, String) - Method in class Controller.ChesstoryGame
Displays a text for the several events which can occured in a chess game (castling, promotion, check, etc).
ChesstoryConstants - Class in Controller
Contains all the constants we use ! (Themes, font_size, texts, etc)
ChesstoryConstants() - Constructor for class Controller.ChesstoryConstants
 
ChesstoryGame - Class in Controller
Manages all the graphic elements and actions in-game (but not the chess board itself), including themes, logs displayer, rules displayer, time travel, etc.
ChesstoryGame(String, int, JFrame) - Constructor for class Controller.ChesstoryGame
Calls YACG to create the chessBoard with the selected rules.
